content.prompt:
© Werner Forman / Art Resource, NY

The ikenga (shrine figure) shown is intended to

choices.label: serve as a family deity used in the household shrine
represent a tribal deity cared for and presided over by elite elders
demonstrate the owner’s achievements and physical prowess
commemorate a political alliance between neighboring kin groups

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
